thread.title: Church House hosts BBC and RBS at women’s business event
thread.title_full: Church House hosts BBC and RBS at women’s business event

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Church House hosts BBC and RBS at women’s business event
text:
Church House hosts BBC and RBS at women’s business event Church House hosts BBC and RBS at women’s business event Details Category: Venues & Events   11:30 Representatives from RBS, the BBC and Matalan were amongst the cross sector delegation who attended a business event for women at Church House Conference Centre last week. The Pearls Programme, put together by An Inspirational Journey, is the only business-led programme which seeks to fix the leaking pipeline of female talent. It provides career support and direction for women in middle through to senior management through a programme of events, networking and online resources. Its events are designed to bring together like minded peers from all sectors of business.. 
It’s latest event, held at Church House on July 8, focused on Agile Leadership and was attended by 200 delegates with the guest speech given by Teresa Mitrovic, Founder of TM&CO. Katie Smith, Group Operations Manager at An Inspirational Journey, comments: “We regularly use Church House not just because of its fantastic location in the heart of Westminster, or because of the high quality food and extraordinary facilities, but because the staff are very attentive and make everything ‘happen’ so we can get on and enjoy the event too.” Robin Parker, General Manager at Church House Conference Centre, commented: “An Inspirational Journey is an organisation which has been using Church House for its events for a number of years. The Pearls Programme event was a great success and covered thought provoking topics which are relevant to everybody in management positions. As a repeat client of Church House we are delighted to support the programme’s growth and look forward to welcoming them back in future.” Church House Conference Centre is an AIM Gold accredited venue situated in the heart of Westminster. It is one of London’s most versatile event venues, accommodating between 2 and 664 guests. The 19 event spaces are supported by a team who are recognised for their commitment to service excellence throughout all areas of events. Related articles
